page.title: 15Stackpole School
page.content: Employed in a non teaching capacity are three cooks two dining room assistants a cleaner and a meals clerk. Some of the most important events in the school year include a concert and party in December and sports day and open day in the summer term.The school visits Pendine and Llangrannog school camps for weekly visits each year and it also enthusiastically takes part in the Urdd National Eisteddfod, entering the recorders, dancing,singing, reciting and art and craft competitions. The school was built in the 1840's but was considerably mordernised in 1960.There are four classrooms and a hall which is used as a dining hall. It is a church school and the vicar comes to speak to the pupils every Friday morning.
